      • init

        @PostConstruct
public void init()
        Adds initial information to database for testing purposes.

      • saveBlogPost

        @PostMapping("/api/blogposts")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Integer> saveBlogPost​(@RequestBody
                                                                               com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode blogPostInfo)
                                                                        throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                                               NoNeededValuesInBodyException
        Creates and saves a BlogPost based on given information. Creates a BlogPost if author is an existing User and then returns the id of created BlogPost.
        Parameters:
        blogPostInfo - needs to have properties authorId, title and content
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with body of id of the blog post and http status CREATED
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - there is no user with given authorId
        NoNeededValuesInBodyException - values are missing from RequestBody

      • saveUser

        @PostMapping("/api/users")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> saveUser​(@RequestBody
                                                              User user)
                                                       throws UsernameAlreadyUsedException
        Creates and saves an User based on given information. Checks if user of that name already exists. If it doesn't, creates a new User, saves it and returns the User object. If user of that name exists, returns null.
        Parameters:
        user - RequestBody with all information of the user
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with body of user and http status CREATED
        Throws:
        UsernameAlreadyUsedException - username is already in use

      • addTagsToBlogPost

        @PostMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}/tag")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> addTagsToBlogPost​(@PathVariable
                                                                                 int blogPostId,
                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> tagNames)
                                                                          throws BlogPostNotFoundException
        Creates Tags, adds them to BlogPost and saves them. If BlogPost of given id exists, goes trough the list on tagNames. If a Tag of same name already exists, then add the existing Tag to the BlogPost. If not, creates a new Tag of that name and adds it to BlogPost.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        tagNames - list of strings
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with http status CREATED
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId

      • addCommentToBlogPost

        @PostMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}/comments")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> addCommentToBlogPost​(@PathVariable
                                                                                    int blogPostId,
                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode commentInfo)
                                                                             throws BlogPostNotFoundException,
                                                                                    UserNotFoundException,
                                                                                    NoNeededValuesInBodyException
        Adds a Comment to given BlogPost. If BlogPost and User exist make create a Comment and save it.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        commentInfo - needs to have properties userId and content
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with http status CREATED
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId
        UserNotFoundException - there is no User with given userId
        NoNeededValuesInBodyException - values are missing from RequestBody

      • addViewAndLikeToBlogPost

        @PostMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}/viewAndLike")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> addViewAndLikeToBlogPost​(@PathVariable
                                                                                        int blogPostId,
                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode viewAndLikeInfo)
                                                                                 throws BlogPostNotFoundException,
                                                                                        UserNotFoundException,
                                                                                        NoNeededValuesInBodyException
        Adds ViewAndLike to BlogPost and User. If BlogPost and User exist, create and save ViewAndLike object.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        viewAndLikeInfo - needs to have userId, view and like
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with http status CREATED
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId
        UserNotFoundException - there is no User with given userId
        NoNeededValuesInBodyException - values are missing from RequestBody

      • deleteBlogPost

        @DeleteMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}")
public void deleteBlogPost​(@PathVariable
                           int blogPostId)
                    throws BlogPostNotFoundException
        Deletes BlogPost and Tags and ViewAndLikes associated with it. If BlogPoist exists, goes trough all the Tags. If Tag is only on the BlogPost, removes it. If not, removes it only from BlogPost's tags. Also removes all ViewAndLikes associated with this BlogPost.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId

      • deleteCommentFromABlogPost

        @DeleteMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}/comments/{commentId}")
public void deleteCommentFromABlogPost​(@PathVariable
                                       int blogPostId,
                                       @PathVariable
                                       int commentId)
                                throws BlogPostNotFoundException,
                                       NoSuchCommentUnderThisBlogPostException
        Deletes Comment from a BlogPost. Checks if BlogPost and Comment exist. Checks if BlogPost has the said Comment. If it is, deletes the comment.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        commentId - id of Comment
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId
        NoSuchCommentUnderThisBlogPostException - there is no comment with commentId in this BlogPost

        @DeleteMapping("/api/users/{userId}")
public void makeUserTypeDeletedById​(@PathVariable
                                    int userId)
                             throws UserNotFoundException
        Changes Users UserType to DELETED, does not delete user from the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - id of User
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - there is no User with given userId

        @DeleteMapping("/api/users/finaldelete/{userId}")
public void removeUserById​(@PathVariable
                           int userId)
                    throws UserNotFoundException
        Deletes User and all ViewAndLikes associated with it. If User exists, deletes it.
        Parameters:
        userId - id of User
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - there is no User with given userId

public java.lang.Iterable<BlogPost> getBlogPostsByAuthorId​(@PathVariable
                                                           int authorId)
                                                    throws UserNotFoundException
        Returns all BlogPosts written by given author. Checks if User of authorId exists. If so, returns all BlogPosts written by that User.
        Parameters:
        authorId - id of User
        Returns:
        BlogPosts (iterable)
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - there is no User with given userId

      • getBlogPostsByTag

        @GetMapping("/api/blogposts/tag/{tagName}")
public java.lang.Iterable<BlogPost> getBlogPostsByTag​(@PathVariable
                                                      java.lang.String tagName)
        Returns all BlogPost that have a Tag of certain name. Checks if tag by given name exists. Returns all BlogPosts that have it. If not, returns empty list.
        Parameters:
        tagName - name of tag in a BlogPost
        Returns:
        BlogPosts (iterable)

      • getBlogPostsByDateAsc

        @GetMapping("/api/blogposts/date/{date:[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}}")
public java.lang.Iterable<BlogPost> getBlogPostsByDateAsc​(@PathVariable
                                                          java.lang.String date)
                                                   throws java.time.format.DateTimeParseException
        Returns all BlogPosts written on a certain day. If date cannot be parsed, will return null.
        Parameters:
        date - String in following form: YYYY-MM-DD
        Returns:
        BlogPosts (iterable)
        Throws:
        java.time.format.DateTimeParseException - Date could not be parsed

      • getBlogPostsByKeyWord

        @GetMapping("/api/blogposts/search_all/{keyWord}")
public java.lang.Iterable<BlogPost> getBlogPostsByKeyWord​(@PathVariable
                                                          java.lang.String keyWord)
        Returns all BlogPost which title, tags or author include the search word. Uses getBlogPostsByTag, getBlogPostsByTitleContaining and getBlogPostsByAuthor to find all BlogPosts. Adds them to a same set. Returns that set.
        Parameters:
        keyWord - word ro search by
        Returns:
        BlogPosts (iterable)

      • userExists

        @PutMapping("/api/users/login")
public User userExists​(@RequestBody
                       com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode loginInformation)
                throws NoNeededValuesInBodyException,
                       LoginFailedException
        Returns user by username and password.
        Parameters:
        loginInformation - needs to have username and password
        Returns:
        User
        Throws:
        NoNeededValuesInBodyException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId
        LoginFailedException - no users found with given username and password

      • updateBlogPost

        @PutMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}")
public void updateBlogPost​(@PathVariable
                           int blogPostId,
                           @RequestBody
                           com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode updateJson)
                    throws BlogPostNotFoundException,
                           NoNeededValuesInBodyException
        Updates the information in a blogPost. If BlogPost exists, gets new information from the updateJson. Uses updateBlogPostTitle, updateBlogPostContent and updateBlogPostTags to update information.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        updateJson - needs to have title, content and tags
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId
        NoNeededValuesInBodyException - values are missing from RequestBody

      • updateBlogPostTitle

        @PutMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}/title")
public void updateBlogPostTitle​(@PathVariable
                                int blogPostId,
                                @RequestBody
                                java.lang.String title)
                         throws BlogPostNotFoundException
        If BlogPost exists, updates the title and TimeOfEdit.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - if of BlogPost
        title - new title
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId

                                  java.lang.String content)
                           throws BlogPostNotFoundException

      • updateBlogPostTags

        @PutMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}/tags")
public void updateBlogPostTags​(@PathVariable
                               int blogPostId,
                               @RequestBody
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags)
                        throws BlogPostNotFoundException
        If BlogPost exists, adds tags. Checks if BlogPost exists. If so, checks if tags already exist. If tag exists, adds it to BlogPost. If not, creates new Tag and adds it to BlogPost.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        tags - new tags
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId

      • toggleBlogPostView

        @PutMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}/toggleView/{userId}")
public void toggleBlogPostView​(@PathVariable
                               int blogPostId,
                               @PathVariable
                               int userId)
                        throws BlogPostNotFoundException,
                               UserNotFoundException
        Toggles view attribute of ViewAndLike of certain blogPostId and userId.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        userId - id of User
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId
        UserNotFoundException - there is no User with given userId

      • toggleBlogPostLike

        @PutMapping("/api/blogposts/{blogPostId}/toggleLike/{userId}")
public void toggleBlogPostLike​(@PathVariable
                               int blogPostId,
                               @PathVariable
                               int userId)
                        throws BlogPostNotFoundException,
                               UserNotFoundException
        Toggles like attribute of ViewAndLike of certain blogPostId and userId, and removes or adds likes to BlogPost.
        Parameters:
        blogPostId - id of BlogPost
        userId - id of User
        Throws:
        BlogPostNotFoundException - there is no BlogPost with given blogPostId
        UserNotFoundException - there is no User with given userId
